section:
Data Structures Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:fft_config_tgitcon_context_t
Gitcon Configuration i2s_sampler_t
Sampler Configuration mcp3201_config_tmcp3201_context_t
MCP3201 Context struct for internal use mcp3201_sampler_tmidi_config_t
MIDI UART Configuration midi_context_t
MIDI Context (internal! not to be accessed externally, use midi_handle_t instead) midi_message_t
MIDI Message
